Title: Silverlight Business Application Toolkit
Description: This Toolkit provides basic functionality to build a business application with Silverlight.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to the Silverlight Business Application Toolkit!

About this project

This Toolkit provides basic functionality to build a business application with Silverlight.

How to get started?

  • Download the latest release
  • or Get the source code

How can I improve this project?

  • Add bugs or feature requests to the Issue Tracker
  • Discuss problems or missing features in the Forum
  • Become a member

Project overview

This is the common part of the toolkit. The toolkit containts (at the moment) 3 projects. This one, the Validation Framework and the Forms Tookit.



How to become a member?

Contact me and give some reasons why.
